body_html:
i meet the same question
.libcublas.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

i use cuda9.0

and use this configure . it can run .
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64${LD_LIBRARY_PATH:+:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}} export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
body_text:
i meet the same question
.libcublas.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
i use cuda9.0
and use this configure  . it can run .
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64${LD_LIBRARY_PATH:+:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}} export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
body:
i meet the same question
 .libcublas.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

i use cuda9.0

and use this configure  . it can run .
`
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64${LD_LIBRARY_PATH:+:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}}
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
`
